post.body: cheers, I actually bought that album by mistake, I was trying to buy "the shining" but was pleasantly surprised.
There's nothing worse than a typo in the middle of a trash-talking come-back.
wait... then how were you baking the other day?
CATA wants the government to spend the money on roads & bridges..... ? that gets a huge WTF!!!
Don't do it!! instant oatmeal ruined oatmeal forever for me.
jeless! I'll be at work late. Kawa's open til 9 so I might hit that.
@dloo I also have a tendancy to jump in on conversations without reading the whole thing.
@rhettsoveran are you guys just spouting jargon or do you actually talk like that?
dropping their twitter names at the bottom of the post should be good. That's what I'd like.
don't you go for lunch every day?
those are much better ideas. French screamo should be postponed until at least after 3pm
it keeps you tough. Work coffee is what makes the good stuff worth it.... I, however, bring my own french press. lol.
haha, and here I thought you were THAT cool.
if it weren't for my gf, I would actually drive you around.... she just wouldn't understand.
my vote is 100% in favour of the Baloon logo... Tom_Mills did a great job. It stuck out and said so much the moment I saw it.
Do whatever the heck you want with your brand and logo. The very fact that it's crowdsourced speaks to the soul of your company.
I've been wanting to data model human development for a long time!
Calgary, Alberta.
I made the switch to tweetdeck yesterday, maybe we read the same tweet.
like... emergency food aid?
oooH! resource allocation? Human resource allocation? like the crew scheduling problem? now that's a good time.
I nominate @starbucks for a Shorty Award in #coffee because they really understand the casualness of the twitterverse.
#blue @superblue -the essence of aquamarine and the champion of azure. She is the queen of the 450nm bandwidth.

fully understood. I wish I could afford someone like that to do my logo.
yes! but they don't have any plugins. That way people can check their email, but can't hang out all day without buying anything
